description.raw:
* Redirect to HTTPs

* Close branch https

* used new security group for SRC instances

* updates to use allow replacing the default security group cloudsim-sim

* make sure termination_date and aws_termination_time are set

* automatically send logs, initial commit

* updated tests to check for termination_date

* removed unused vars

* Close branch src-new-secgroup

* added s3keys related tests to srcrounds tests

* Open port 80 (which will redirect to 443)

* Check budget before launching SRC

* more s3 tests

* Close branch budget_src

* Close branch https

* Close branch send-logs
